mapper.select: -- 다가오는 스테이지 목록 (4개) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STAGE_ID, CREATE_TIMESTAMP, USER_ID, STAGE_TITLE, STAGE_IMAGE, STAGE_LOCATION, STAGE_TIMESTAMP, STAGE_ARTIST_ID, STAGE_DESCRIPTION, STAGE_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, STAGE_TICKET_PRICE, STAGE_CURRENT, STAGE_STREAM_KEY, STAGE_COMBINE_ID, CASE WHEN STAGE_COMBINE_ID IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS STAGE_SEQUENCE FROM TB_FULLDIVE_STAGE WHERE 1=1 ) TFSTG WHERE 1=1 AND STAGE_SEQUENCE = '1' AND STAGE_CURRENT = 'R' ORDER BY STAGE_TIMESTAMP ASC LIMIT 4

SELECT STAGE_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), USER_ID, STAGE_TITLE, STAGE_IMAGE, STAGE_LOCATION, TO_CHAR(STAGE_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), STAGE_ARTIST_ID, STAGE_DESCRIPTION, STAGE_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, STAGE_TICKET_PRICE, STAGE_CURRENT, STAGE_STREAM_KEY FROM TB_FULLDIVE_STAGE WHERE 1=1
AND STAGE_ID = #{stageId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STAGE_ID, CREATE_TIMESTAMP, USER_ID, STAGE_TITLE, STAGE_IMAGE, STAGE_LOCATION, STAGE_TIMESTAMP, STAGE_ARTIST_ID, STAGE_DESCRIPTION, STAGE_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, STAGE_TICKET_PRICE, STAGE_CURRENT, STAGE_STREAM_KEY, STAGE_COMBINE_ID, -(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW() - STAGE_TIMESTAMP)/3600)::Integer AS STAGE_TIME_DIFFERENCE, CASE WHEN STAGE_COMBINE_ID IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS STAGE_SEQUENCE FROM TB_FULLDIVE_STAGE WHERE 1=1 ) TFSTG WHERE 1=1 AND STAGE_SEQUENCE = '1' AND STAGE_CURRENT = 'R' ORDER BY STAGE_TIMESTAMP ASC LIMIT 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STAGE_ID, CREATE_TIMESTAMP, USER_ID, STAGE_TITLE, STAGE_IMAGE, STAGE_LOCATION, STAGE_TIMESTAMP, STAGE_ARTIST_ID, STAGE_DESCRIPTION, STAGE_THUMBNAIL_IMAGE, STAGE_TICKET_PRICE, STAGE_CURRENT, STAGE_STREAM_KEY, STAGE_COMBINE_ID, CASE WHEN STAGE_COMBINE_ID IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS STAGE_SEQUENCE FROM TB_FULLDIVE_STAGE WHERE 1=1 ) TFSTG WHERE 1=1 AND STAGE_SEQUENCE = '1' AND STAGE_CURRENT = 'E' ORDER BY STAGE_TIMESTAMP ASC LIMIT 4
